title: Shock Doctor Ice Recovery Compression Ankle Wrap
features: Ideal for sprained ankles and other ankle injuries^Use for general soreness after workouts, practice or competition^Anatomical design for full coverage and comfort^Removable & adjustable straps with Z-Grip closures for fit and compression^Small/Med includes 3 Gel Packs; LG/XL includes 4 Gel Packs
description: An ultra-comfortable, non-neoprene ankle sleeve that provides targeted compression and support. It features anatomical knit construction, contoured compression zones, and support for moderate pain relief and recovery. Non-restrictive motion with superior breathability Moisture-wicking technology. 4-way stretch elastic material for compression without heat retention. Latex Free.
